infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Remak uses your location to track employee attendance and verify work locations. For example, when you check in at the office, the app records your GPS coordinates to confirm you are at the correct workplace.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Remak needs access to your location to enable attendance tracking and location-based business features. For example, the app uses your location to verify you are at the correct work site when clocking in/out, ensuring accurate time tracking for payroll and project management.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Remak uses the camera to capture photos for inventory documentation, product images, and work-related documentation. For example, you can take photos of products, damaged items, or work progress to attach to inventory entries and reports.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Remak accesses your photo library to select and attach images to inventory entries, reports, and documentation. For example, you can select existing photos to add to product records or work documentation.
